# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.

# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

set(ANTLR_PACKAGE_NAME NSQLv1Generated)

set(PROTOBUF_HEADER_PATH yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_proto_split)

set(PROTOBUF_SUFFIX_PATH .pb.main.h)

add_library(proto_ast-gen-v1_antlr4)


target_compile_options(proto_ast-gen-v1_antlr4 PRIVATE
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)

target_include_directories(proto_ast-gen-v1_antlr4 PUBLIC
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/antlr4_cpp_runtime/src
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_antlr4/org/antlr/v4/tool/templates/codegen/Cpp
)

target_link_libraries(proto_ast-gen-v1_antlr4 PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  proto_ast-gen-v1_proto_split
  parser-proto_ast-antlr4
)

target_sources(proto_ast-gen-v1_antlr4 PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_antlr4/SQLv1Antlr4Parser.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_antlr4/SQLv1Antlr4Lexer.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_antlr4/org/antlr/v4/tool/templates/codegen/Cpp/Cpp.stg
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_antlr4/org/antlr/v4/tool/templates/codegen/Cpp/Files.stg
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_antlr4/SQLv1Antlr4Parser.h
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_antlr4/SQLv1Antlr4Lexer.h
)


configure_file(
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/org/antlr/v4/tool/templates/codegen/Cpp/Cpp.stg.in
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_antlr4/org/antlr/v4/tool/templates/codegen/Cpp/Cpp.stg
)

configure_file(
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/org/antlr/v4/tool/templates/codegen/Cpp/Files.stg.in
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_antlr4/org/antlr/v4/tool/templates/codegen/Cpp/Files.stg
)

run_antlr4(
  OUTPUT
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_antlr4/SQLv1Antlr4Parser.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_antlr4/SQLv1Antlr4Lexer.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_antlr4/SQLv1Antlr4Parser.h
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_antlr4/SQLv1Antlr4Lexer.h
  WORKING_DIRECTORY
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_antlr4
  ANTLER_ARGS
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_antlr4/SQLv1Antlr4.g
  -no-listener
  -package
  NALPDefaultAntlr4
  -lib
  .
  -o
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yql/essentials/parser/proto_ast/gen/v1_antlr4
)
set(GRAMMAR_STRING_CORE_SINGLE "~(['\\\\]) | (BACKSLASH .)")
set(GRAMMAR_STRING_CORE_DOUBLE "~([\"\\\\]) | (BACKSLASH .)")
set(GRAMMAR_MULTILINE_COMMENT_CORE ".")

configure_file(
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/sql/v1/SQLv1Antlr4.g.in
